circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Anchorage-Intl Airport, while climbing, the airplane stalled and crashed. A crew member was killed while two others were seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Stall during initial climb after the pilot-in-command failed to maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Inadequate preflight preparation, 
- Airframe ice, 
- Frost found on wings after impact.
